name: s72_procrastinators_to-do_list
description: The **Procrastinator's To-Do List** is a playful and interactive task management application designed for those who love to delay their tasks with style. Unlike traditional to-do apps, this app embraces procrastination and adds a humorous twist, making it fun while subtly helping users manage their tasks more effectively. Itâ€™s productivity with a touch of irony!
author: Avinash Kumar Sah
